ref: Soon he and the kid were laughing and playing games.

src: 不幸的是，一个私人问题使他的竞选戛然而止。
mt: Unfortunately, a private matter ended his campaign.
ref: Unfortunately a personal issue derailed his campaign.

src: 然后它滚到了小溪里。
mt: Then it rolled into a creek.
ref: It then rolled into the creek.

src: 我们去吃了晚餐并看了电影。
mt: We went out to eat and saw a movie.
ref: We went to dinner and a movie.

src: 他决定无论如何都要去徒步。
mt: He decided to go on foot no matter what.
ref: He decided to hike the jungle regardless.

src: 卡尔对他爸爸放在车库里的自行车很感兴趣。
mt: Carl was interested in the bicycle his father had in the garage.
ref: Carl showed interest in his dad's bike in the garage.

src: 当她跑到卫生间时，呕吐感已经消退了。
mt: When she ran to the bathroom, the nausea had subsided.
ref: By the time she reached the bathroom the gagging had subsided.

src: 他在高中和大学学习科学和天文学。
mt: He studied science and astronomy in high school and college.
ref: He studied science and astronomy through high school and college.

src: 她是唯一一个穿着戏装的！
mt: She's the only one wearing a costume!
ref: She was the only one in costume!

src: 最终詹姆斯跑下了那场马拉松。
mt: James finally ran the marathon.
ref: Finally James ran the marathon.

src: 令我沮丧的是，我鲁莽行车所以我发生了一场意外事故。
mt: I was disappointed that I was reckless driving and I had an accident.
ref: To my dismay, my reckless biking caused me to get in an accident.

src: 她们继续私语。
mt: They continue to whisper.
ref: They continued to whisper.

src: 冰箱不运行了。
mt: The fridge is not running.
ref: It was not on.

src: 我在身后闪烁的灯光中等待着。
mt: I wait in the flashing lights behind me.
ref: I waited with the lights flashing behind me.

src: 她决定试一试她妈妈的一个建议。
mt: She decided to try her mother's suggestion.
ref: She decided to try one of her mother's suggestions out.

src: 在决战之夜他赢下了所有回合。
mt: On the night of the final, he won all the rounds.
ref: On the night of the fight he had won all rounds.

src: 他吃了美味的食物并遍尝了多种风味的红酒。
mt: He ate delicious food and tasted many flavors of wine.
ref: He eats delicious food and drinks many types of wine.

src: 然后肯将管风琴装入了他的卡车。
mt: Then Ken put the organ in his truck.
ref: Ken then loaded the organ into his truck.

src: 那些植物花了2周时间来运达。
mt: 2 weeks for those plants to arrive.
ref: It took 2 weeks for the plants to arrive.

src: 幸运的是，她的朋友们很有幽默感。
mt: Luckily, her friends are very funny.
ref: Luckily, her friends had a sense of humor.

src: 最终桑德拉说服了她的父母让她养一只乌龟。
mt: In the end, Sandra convinced her parents to let her keep a turtle.
ref: Eventually Sandra convinced her parents she should get a turtle.

src: 最终，他们放弃了并玩了其他东西。
mt: In the end, they gave up and played something else.
ref: Ultimately, they gave up and played something else.

src: 他通过了他全部的考试！
mt: He passed all his exams!
ref: He passed all his exams!

src: 她把松果滚在在花生酱和鸟食里。
mt: She rolled the hazelnut in peanut butter and birdseed.
ref: She rolled the pinecones in peanut butter and bird seed.

src: 我们吃了一餐还分享了一个甜点。
mt: We had a meal and shared a dessert.
ref: We ate our meals, and shared a dessert.

src: 吃完饭后，她在沙发上睡着了。
mt: After dinner, she fell asleep on the sofa.
ref: After eating, she falls asleep on the couch.

src: 多年之后，韩和莱娅有了一个孩子。
mt: Years later, Han and Leah had a child.
ref: Many Year's later, Han and Leia had a child.

src: 吉娜假装那不是她的手机。
mt: Gina pretended that wasn't her phone.
ref: Gina pretended it wasn't her phone.

src: 她的焦虑症现在被控制得很好。
mt: Her anxiety is now well controlled.
ref: Her anxiety is now under control.

src: 简满心担忧，她去了教室门口来找她女儿。
mt: Jia was worried, so she went to the classroom door to look for her daughter.
ref: Worried, Jan went to the door of the class to find her daughter.

src: 萨拉的大拇脚指骨折了。
mt: Sara's thumb is broken.
ref: Sarah broke her big toe.

src: 他意识到他多年以前就应该搬去新泽西。
mt: He realized he should have moved to New Jersey years ago.
ref: He realizes he should have moved to New Jersey Years ago.

src: 他很紧张。
mt: He was nervous.
ref: He was nervous.

src: 她的室友开始戴耳机。
mt: Her roommate started wearing earphones.
ref: Her roommate began wearing headphones.

src: 当他锻炼时，皮特汗流浃背。
mt: When he was exercising, Pete was sweating profusely.
ref: While working out, Pete worked up a sweat.

src: 然后克莱尔开始感到热。
mt: Then Claire began to feel hot.
ref: And Clare began feeling hot.

src: 一周之后，是她去拿工钱的时候了。
mt: 7 days later, it was time to collect her pay.
ref: After a week, it was time to collect her pay.

src: 吉娜绞尽脑汁但她找不到话题了。
mt: Gina wracks her brain but she can't find a topic.
ref: Gina racked her brain but could find nothing to say.

src: 他终于意识到问题所在了。
mt: He finally realized what the problem was.
ref: Finally, he realized the problem.

src: 那个申请人非常敏感，并决定与我谈谈。
mt: That applicant was very sensitive and decided to talk to me.
ref: The requester was very responsive and decided to talk to me.

src: 斯泰西与凯文分享了她的薯片。
mt: Stacy and Kevin shared her potato chips.
ref: Stacey shared her chips with Kevin.

src: 格伦变得愤怒。
mt: Glen became angry.
ref: Glen becomes outraged.

src: 幸好报酬还算优厚。
mt: Fortunately, the pay is pretty good.
ref: Thankfully the pay was good.

src: 开车、吃饭还有睡觉，是我们仅有的会停车的理由。
ref: Driving, eating, and sleeping were the only reasons we would stop.

src: 吉尔有时开始表现得像哥伦布。
mt: Gil sometimes started acting like Columbus.
ref: Gill started acting like Columbo sometimes.

src: 他没中他的倒数第二个球。
mt: He missed his second-to-last shot.
ref: He missed his second to last one.

src: 另一个男人挣扎着，但他太孱弱了，无法阻止自己的死亡。
mt: Another man struggled, but he was too weak to stop his death.
ref: The other man struggled but he was too weak to prevent his own demise.

src: 一位医生查看之后告诉伊万咬伤被感染了！
mt: A doctor told Ivan that he had been infected after he was bitten!
ref: A doctor looked at it and told Ivan the bite was infected!

src: 她觉得她的学习被落下了。
mt: She felt her learning was left behind.
ref: She fell behind in her studies.

src: 她答应了，他们之后度过了愉快的时光。
mt: She agreed, and they had a pleasant time together afterwards.
ref: She said yes, and they had a good time.

src: 他开始演奏一曲。
mt: He began to play a tune.
ref: He starts playing a song.

src: 她们步入了车厢并扣上了安全带。
mt: They entered the car and buckled their seat belts.
ref: They stepped in the cars and put on their seatbelts.
